sentences.en: A group of Australian words such as abo ( aborigine ) or tyke ( Catholic ) display a degree of intolerance ( Leonard Santorelli )
sentences.cn: 一些澳大利亚词,如澳大利亚土著居民或天主教体现了某种不相容的程度 ( 伦纳德圣雷利 )

sentences.en: After , the aborigine also will been moved out steppe.
sentences.cn: 原住民也要被迁移出草原.

sentences.en: At that instant, a coin slipped out of the aborigine's hand.
sentences.cn: 正在此时, 一枚硬币从土著人的手中滑落.

sentences.en: Over the years, Aborigine tribal members have updated past artworks with different styles and new subjects.
sentences.cn: 多年来, 土著居民利用不同的方式和更新的题材来使艺术作品跟上时代潮流.

sentences.en: Used as a disparaging term for an australian aborigine.
sentences.cn: 土著对澳大利亚土著人的贬义称呼.

sentences.en: Whether I am or am not aborigine isn't important!
sentences.cn: 我是不是原住民并不重要!

trans.tran_cn: （尤指澳大利亚的）土著居民，（常作A-） 澳洲土著语，（常用复数）土生动物（或植物）群
trans.tran_en: someone who belongs to the race of people who have lived in Australia from the earliest times
